content.question: Which of the following statements is true about the network?

choices.label: Information sent from device A to device D can use at most two unique paths.
Information sent from device A to device I will pass through at most four other devices.
If devices B and F fail, then device A will not be able to communicate with device G.
If devices C and F fail, then device D will not be able to communicate with device H.

content.answer: If devices B and F fail, then device A will not be able to communicate with device G.
